trans-unit.source: responses.SendEmail is also an iterator that contains information about the status (and possible errors) of every message from the batch. Items are instances of responses.SendEmailResponse, containing data returned by the API.
trans-unit.target: responses.SendEmail 也是一个迭代器，它包含有关批处理中每条消息的状态（和可能的错误）的信息。项目是 responses.SendEmailResponse 实例，包含API返回的数据。

trans-unit.source: As this method allows for sending just one email, without batching, the response is simply an instance of responses.SendEmailResponse.
trans-unit.target: 由于这种方法允许只发送一个电子邮件，没有配料，响应简单的实例 responses.SendEmailResponse 。
贡献
用于发送电子邮件的Coresender API
核心Python SDK

trans-unit.source: Creating issues if you find problems
trans-unit.target: 发现问题就制造问题

trans-unit.source: For debug purposes there is a flag in Coresender.init method (look at Usage section above). If you enable debug, the library will print out logs to STDERR by default. You can configure it further by fetching coresender log handler:
trans-unit.target: 出于调试目的， Coresender.init 方法中有一个标志（请参见上面的“用法”部分）。如果启用 debug ，则默认情况下该库会将日志输出到 STDERR 。您可以通过获取 coresender 日志处理程序来进一步配置它：
要安装依赖项，请使用Pipenv：

trans-unit.source: For more information about loggers, take a look at official documentation of the logging module.
trans-unit.target: 有关记录器的更多信息，请参阅 logging 模块的官方文档。

trans-unit.target: 下面是如何使用SDK发送邮件。

trans-unit.source: Instead of putting sending account credentials directly in the code, you may want to put them in your environment variables:
trans-unit.target: 与其在代码中直接放入发送账户凭证,不如将其放入环境变量中。

Python 3.6以上版本

trans-unit.source: Run the following command to get started:
trans-unit.target: 运行以下命令来启动。

trans-unit.source: The Coresender PHP SDK is an open-source project released under MIT license. We welcome any contributions!
trans-unit.target: Coresender PHP SDK是一个在MIT许可下发布的开源项目。我们欢迎任何贡献

trans-unit.source: The Coresender service. You can start with a free 100 emails/month developer plan and move to one of our pricing plans when you're done.
trans-unit.target: Coresender服务。您可以从免费的每月100封电子邮件的开发者计划开始，然后在完成后转到我们的定价计划之一。

trans-unit.source: The library will detect it automatically and use the credentials stored as environment variables.
trans-unit.target: 该库将自动检测并使用存储为环境变量的凭证。

trans-unit.source: The response is an instance of responses.SendEmail. Because this method allows for sending many emails with one API request, the SendEmail.all_accepted property lets you quickly check if all messages were accepted. If its value is false it means you have to further check for rejected messages.
trans-unit.target: 响应是的一个实例 responses.SendEmail 。因为此方法允许通过一个API请求发送许多电子邮件，所以 SendEmail.all_accepted 属性使您可以快速检查是否接受了所有消息。如果其值为 false ,则意味着您必须进一步检查拒绝的消息。

trans-unit.source: The result of a method call is, by default, a domain object. Every response object has http_status property that contains API HTTP response code. Other properties depend on the method you use.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，方法调用的结果是域对象。每个响应对象都具有包含API HTTP响应代码的 http_status 属性。其他属性取决于您使用的方法。

trans-unit.source: This is the officially supported Python library for Coresender. It allows you to quickly and easily integrate with our API and improve your email deliverability.
trans-unit.target: 这是Coresender官方支持的Python库。它使您可以快速轻松地与我们的API集成，并改善电子邮件的可传递性。
使用方法
编写新代码

trans-unit.source: You can also use CORESENDER_DEBUG environment variable to toggle debug logs.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以使用 CORESENDER_DEBUG 环境变量来切换调试日志。
